name: Only Juan (Almightyzentaco)
description:
Only Juan!

Join Juan on his deep sea adventure as he explores the depths of the ocean in search of treasure, monsters, and glory! 

Talk to dolphins! Discover hidden ruins! Collect treasure! Drive a sombrero shaped submarine! And if you go deep enough, you may uncover the great leviathan that lives at the bottom of the ocean.

  • You have ONLY ONE minute of air. Don't stay down too long.
  • You have ONLY ONE harpoon shot. Don't waste it!
  • you have ONLY ONE life. Be careful!
  • Find the great leviathan, of which there is ONLY ONE
  • Juan the adventure is the ONLY ONE brave enough for this adventure.

Controls

Arrow keys to move.

Shift to enter and exit the submarine.

Space to talk to dolphins and jump when on land.

Ctrl to fire your weapons.

Programming: Joshua D. Koester (AlmightyZenTaco)

Art: Andrew Condon (MonkeyFox)
